variable.comment: Select an employe randomly. 1 = BloBl1 ; 2 = BloBl2 ; 3 = BrwBl1 ; 3 = Brwbl2 ; 5 = GinBl1 ; 6 = GinBl2
variable.name: employeRandSelector

variable.comment: 0 = music not playing ; 1 = music is playing
variable.name: musicIsPlaying

variable.comment: Your voice volume from inaudible (0) to shooting (100)
variable.name: voiceVolume

variable.comment: your visible mood from angry (-5) to happy (-1) with neutral at -3
variable.name: mood

variable.comment: 0 = not making a round ; <1 = making a round
variable.name: makingRound

variable.comment: 0 = init and not installed ; 1 = installed ; 2 = not installed
variable.name: isInstall_plant

variable.comment: 0 = init and not installed ; 1 = installed ; 2 = not installed
variable.name: isInstall_window

variable.comment: 0 = default formal dresscode ; 1 = decontract dresscode ; 2 = forced formal dresscode
variable.name: actualDressCode
